document_data.mainbody:
lackjaw was a species of predatory fish that inhabited the Lake Glorfindar in the Starmetal Hills and remined active through the winter months under the lakes ice.
These somewhat uncommon creatures had long eel-like sinuous bodies and large heads with massive mouths. They had green scales.
Blackjaws were a nuisance for ice-fishers and anglers. They waited for a fish to be caught by an angler and snatched the easy prey before the catch could be dragged out of the ice hole. They were edible and were a part of a winters heros feasts served during the annual Simril celebration in Twilight Tor. The feast also consisted of cooked brown bream, candlefish, and durgrace.
